action.general_scene_description: The screenshot shows an email client with an email open. The email is from Fujitsu and is requesting to reschedule a meeting.
action.mouse_action: The user is not interacting with the mouse, an email is being sent.
action.program_description: An email client open with an email from Fujitsu about rescheduling a meeting. The email is addressed to kta.yasuda@gmail.com and proposes changing the meeting time from 2024-11-17 16:00~17:00 to 17:00~18:00.
